actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify the intent of Congress in providing for exemption from taxation of that amount of military retirement pay paid to a veteran equal to the amount of tax-free veterans' compensation or pension benefit to which the veteran is determined to be retroactively entitled but for the receipt of such military retirement pay.

summary.text: Excludes certain military retirement pay from gross income when such pay is essentially equivalent to a veterans' pension or compensation which is excludable.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to clarify the intent of Congress in providing for exemption from taxation of that amount of military retirement pay paid to a veteran equal to the amount of tax-free veterans' compensation or pension benefit to which the veteran is determined to be retroactively entitled but for the receipt of such military retirement pay.
